EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to submitter on receipt of initial Toolkit Provider Application.
EmailTemplate.name: Toolkit Application Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit: Thank you for your application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Name}:
Thank you for your interest in the {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit. We have received your application and it will be processed in the order in which it was received.
If you have questions or concerns, you can contact us by submitting an inquiry.
To submit an inquiry, you will need to:
1. Log in to your Assistance Dashboard (https://www.export.gov/dashboard). 2. Select the link to your Toolkit application. 3. Enter a comment in the “Attachments & Comments” box. 4. Click “Add” to send the communication to a member of the {!Case.RecordType} Team.
To learn more about trade promotion opportunities and other services available to you as a U.S. exporter, please visit the {!Case.RecordType} Web Portal.
Thank you, The {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit Team
